I am the thrill-seeking thief and ready for action.

The rush, man, it's all about the rush.  It ain't about the stuff itself, you know?  It's about the dance, the game.  Getting in, getting what I want, right under everyone's noses.  It's like a puzzle, figuring out the angles, the weaknesses, the perfect moment to strike.

There's this feeling, this surge of power, when you pull it off.  Like you've outsmarted the whole system, beaten the odds.  And the thing itself?  It's just a symbol, a trophy.  A reminder that I can do what I want, when I want.  It's a middle finger to the rules, to the boring, predictable life everyone else lives.

This one, though, this is different.  This is gonna be a masterpiece.
